item.title: About
item.author: Ning Zhang
item.description:
What is the Economics?

I have traveled a long trip to find a deeper answer behind of this question. I think I did not get satisfactory one yet, and I still on the way to seek the real economics insights and training.

At this period, I am not sure which kind people I am, I have no idea. I try to find myself and love myself. You can view my CV and you may formally know more about me.

I like beer, cooking, travel and cars. I usually think aimlessly and am keen to do something meaningful.

What I Am Doing Now (Spring 2023)

  • Improving my very bad English
  • Reading Economics textbooks (advanced)
  • Searching more opportunities for research work
  • Try to calm down in R coding

People I Admire

  • Xuening GU: classical Chinese literature, modern economics and philosophy
  • George Frisvold: who changed my life
  • Satheesh Aradhyul: the best professor in econometrics and statistics teaching
  • Yihui Xie: specialist in R, humble and funny
  • Taisu Zhang: professor at Law in Yale, top Chinese scholar
  • Tauhidur Rahman: an Economist with great responsibility

About Website

This website is built by Blogdown in R and based on Hugo and I used model and frame from Yihui’s website. I love his thoughts about Internet and website building which would record your history and every step in modern Internet, but also people can preserve ideas from the past. Another reason is I want to public some interesting topic in research.

I am not good at coding, obviously, this website has some bugs that I cannot fix it.

Find Me

Mail: mail#ning.im

Twitter: @brucenzhang

UArizona: AREC
